pageContext.claim: “I have other polls where I'm winning, and you've seen them too, I guess. But, I have polls. Just like last time, I was losing to Hillary in every state, and I won every state, OK. I won Michigan, I won Wisconsin, I won places that they didn't even think were pollable, they didn't even want to go bother.”
pageContext.analysis: Many polls showed Trump losing to Hillary Clinton. But Biden's national polling lead is wider than Clinton's ever was in 2016, and he also leads Trump in more swing-state polls than Clinton did four years before, according to FiveThirtyEight.
